Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:44:28 +0000 Lorraine Ryan, the president of Tauranga's Floral Art Group, is opening her garden for the Bay of Plenty Garden and Art Festival.

Warning after Northland woman in 70s has handbag taken from supermarket trolley https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/warning-after-northland-woman-in-70s-has-handbag-taken-from-supermarket-trolley/M4NIQ7OMN5HWRERGSHO3XVS4OI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/warning-after-northland-woman-in-70s-has-handbag-taken-from-supermarket-trolley/M4NIQ7OMN5HWRERGSHO3XVS4OI/ Denise PiperPensioner too scared to do anything when her bag was taken outside Pak'nSave Kaitāia. Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:39:25 +0000 The woman is warning others not to leave their handbag in their supermarket trolley, after hers was taken from the carpark of a Far North supermarket. Photo / 123RF
Walk for Alzheimer’s, Gizzy Laser Half Marathon and She Shed Tour in Tairāwhiti this weekend https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/walk-for-alzheimers-gizzy-laser-half-marathon-and-she-shed-tour-in-tairawhiti-this-weekend/S44A23FU6BAJ5HPB7BMXYN3QVI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/walk-for-alzheimers-gizzy-laser-half-marathon-and-she-shed-tour-in-tairawhiti-this-weekend/S44A23FU6BAJ5HPB7BMXYN3QVI/ Kim ParkinsonWhat's on in Tairāwhiti this weekend: Gizzy Laser Half Marathon and She Shed Tour Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:29:25 +0000 Paul Gow ticks off the k’s at last year's Gizzy Laser Half Marathon, which started and finished at Matawhero Wines and took in the stopbank track along Waipaoa River. The 2024 edition is being held on Sunday and will once again feature half-marathon, 5km or 10km walk or run options. Photo / Liam Clayton

Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:16:05 +0000 An industrial rating category was introduced in Tauranga where industrial properties pay 2.6 times more than residential. Photo / Andrew Warner
Pahīatua Railcar Society to return to 2025 Art Deco celebrations with 1939 railcar https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/pahiatua-railcar-society-to-return-to-2025-art-deco-celebrations-with-1939-railcar/Q35RILJRRVAE5J6PV57VILKSAE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/pahiatua-railcar-society-to-return-to-2025-art-deco-celebrations-with-1939-railcar/Q35RILJRRVAE5J6PV57VILKSAE/ Michaela GowerAn authentic Art Deco period railcar will travel from Pahīatua to delight passengers. Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:07:38 +0000 The RM 31 Tokomaru Railcar will take passengers through Hastings and on to Waipukurau and Takapau.
Dog found with tyre marks on body after Levin hit and run that snapped owner’s leg https://www.nzherald.co.nz/manawatu-guardian/news/dog-found-with-tyre-marks-on-body-after-levin-hit-and-run-that-snapped-owners-leg/ RCIJGITDAZBTVLQ4KCRVDCJKYQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/manawatu-guardian/news/dog-found-with-tyre-marks-on-body-after-levin-hit-and-run-that-snapped-owners-leg/ RCIJGITDAZBTVLQ4KCRVDCJKYQ/ Paul WilliamsApollo was found scared and hiding behind a shed. Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:04:36 +0000 The Levin woman hit by a car while walking her dog had a six-hour operation on her broken leg and faces more surgery.
